name: Token Teknoloji A.Ş. Token Metaverse
description: Token Metaverse (TMETA), launched by Token Teknoloji A.Ş., in 2022, is a thematic basket token that includes multiple cryptocurrencies. This innovative token represents a portfolio of the best metaverse tokens that are weighted by experts. TMETA offers its investors an easy and secure way to take the leap into the emerging metaverse world. Due to its structure which includes various metaverse tokens, TMETA makes it possible to trade a whole portfolio of metaverse coins with a single click of a button. With this structure, TMETA is able to minimise the commission fee costs incurred when trading a large number of cryptocurrencies and creates the opportunity to manage a metaverse portfolio not only more easily but also more cost-effectively. TMETA, which has advantages such as simple trading, effective market monitoring and low cost, was created on Avax C-Chain. The cryptocurrencies contained in TMETA and their weights are regularly shared transparently on token.com.tr.
